summary: Iteration 21 - Production Module Phase 3 (DPR Reports) and Full Module Review: All 10 features tested and PASSED. DPR Reports with Daily/Weekly/Stage tabs, Leads Kanban with 10 stages, CRM Accounts with dynamic forms, Inventory Warehouses (5), Production Dashboard with 7-stage pipeline, Production sidebar with 5 items, and Field Registry all working correctly.
seed_data_creation: Used existing data: 1 production entry on COAT-01 machine, 10 leads across 10 stages, 5 warehouses, 3 machines, 14 customer accounts
context_for_next_testing_agent: Production Module Phase 3 DPR Reports is complete. All modules (CRM, Inventory, Production) are properly integrated. Field Registry manages dynamic stages for Leads Kanban. DPR shows production data for 2026-01-23 with Coating stage active.

1_dpr_reports_page.details: DPR Reports page loads with Daily Report tab showing 5 summary cards: Total Entries (1), Work Orders Active (1), Total Output (5), Total Wastage (0), Hours Worked (0)

2_dpr_stage_wise_summary.details: Stage-wise Production Summary table shows Coating stage with metrics: 1 entry, 100 input, 5 output, 0 wastage, 0% wastage rate, 0 hours, 5 hourly avg

3_dpr_machine_production.details: Coating - Machine Production table shows 'Coating Line 1 - Main' with 1 entry, 5 output, 0 wastage, 0% wastage rate, 4% norm, 0.0 hours, 5 hourly avg, OK status

4_dpr_weekly_trend_tab.details: Weekly Trend tab loads with summary cards (Total Output 7 days: 5, Total Wastage: 0, Avg Daily Output: 5, Avg Wastage %: 0%) and Daily Trend table showing 2026-01-23 data

5_leads_kanban.details: Leads Pipeline shows '10 leads across 10 stages'. Kanban columns visible: New (3 leads), Hot Leads (2), Cold Leads (0), Contacted (0), Qualified (1), Proposal, Negotiation, Converted, Customer, Lost

6_crm_accounts_dialog.details: Customer Accounts page shows 14 total accounts. Add Account dialog opens with dynamic form containing 4 tabs: Basic Info, Addresses, Contacts, Credit & Terms. Form fields include Customer Name, Account Type, Industry, GSTIN, PAN, Website, etc.

7_inventory_warehouses.details: Warehouse Dashboard shows 5 GST Locations: Test Warehouse TEST-WH-FC49, PO Test Warehouse (PO-WH-585E), Test Warehouse TEST-WH-B345, PO Test Warehouse (PO-WH-9140), Integration Test Warehouse (INT-WH-B6DD). All marked as Active.

8_production_dashboard.details: Production Control Center shows 7-Stage Manufacturing Workflow. Summary cards: Total SKUs (2), PCS in Process (8995), SQM in Process (3000), Overall Progress (0%), Machines (3). Pipeline shows all 7 stages: Coating (1 pending, 1 active), Slitting, Rewinding, Cutting, Packing, Ready to Deliver, Delivered

9_production_sidebar.details: Production sidebar group expanded showing 5 items: Overview, Work Orders, Machines, Order Sheets, DPR Reports. All navigation links working correctly.

10_field_registry.details: Field Registry page loads with Module selector (CRM, Inventory, Accounts, Production, Procurement, HRMS) and Entity selector (Leads, Customer Accounts, Quotations, Samples). Configure panel shows Kanban Stages, Form Fields, List Display tabs. CRM > Leads shows 10 stages: New, Hot Leads, Cold Leads, Contacted, Qualified, Proposal, Negotiation, Converted, Customer, Lost
